instructions: Tap the player to open Now Playing. Tap the Lyrics button to show lyrics that scroll in time with the music. Tap the Lyrics button again to return to Now Playing.

Tap the player to open Now Playing. Tap the Playing Next button , then tap a song to play it and the songs that follow. To reorder the list, drag the Reorder button . Tap the Playing Next button again to return to Now Playing.
Tap the player to open Now Playing. Tap the Playing Next button , then swipe down to see the playing history. Tap a song in the history to play it. Tap Clear to remove your playing history.
Tap the player to open Now Playing. Tap the Playback Destination button , then choose a device.
